recipesJson.name: Peanut Butter Custard Milkshake
recipesJson.author: DataNotAnecdotes
recipesJson.description:
Because I like my recipes in recipe form, instead of video form.

Koolada at 1 drop per 15ml.

Originally from SteamRoom at;
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M67_89eFmyE

He made it, I just converted it into a usable format for me and thought I'd share.

reviews.text: I added 1 drop per 30 ml MTS vape wizard, 2 drops of sucralose, replaced vanilla swirl with Heavenly vanilla, and doubled the koolada. Been steeping about a week, try it out. Thanks for posting, turned out really, really well. This is the first peanut butter recipe I'll make again.
This stuff is actually really good after a few weeks steep. Thanks for sharing.
